--- title: "KIND network update" format: html editor_options: chunk_output_type: console execute: echo: false message: false --- ```{=html} ``` ## Week beginning Mon 17th February 2025 Dear colleagues, Welcome to the regular KIND network update. Again, lots of training sessions underway this week. Please see [our training mini-site](https://nes-dew.github.io/KIND-training/) for full details and resources. Hope to see you at something soon Brendan --- ## Wins of The Week In the spirit of [#IAmRemarkable](https://www.rmrkblty.org/iamremarkable), we do a weekly wins of the week thread to celebrate the professional (and personal) achievements of the community: + Applied for a promoted post and have been selected for interview - even if I am not the successful candidate - applying for a new role is way outside my comfort zone, so being shortlisted feels like a huge win. + I received good feedback from a senior manager on a dashboard I worked hard on. + Led a session on measurement and developing measurement plans and it was well received! Fells like a big win :-) + Managed to fix number and percentage formats on a monthly spreadsheet following learning at this weeks Excel session, straight forward when you know how it works :) Well done all, and looking forward to [hearing your wins of the week](https://forms.office.com/e/8DgpNP6rcK) in future. --- ## Training sessions Click the link to book yourself into the session. `````{=html}
Session Date Area Level
Scope of the possible with Power BI 09:30-10:30 Tue 18th February 2025 Power BI ðŸ’¼: non-technical
Excel formulas 11:00-12:00 Tue 18th February 2025 Excel ðŸŒ¶ :beginner-level
R from scratch (session 4) 14:00-15:00 Tue 18th February 2025 R ðŸŒ¶ :beginner-level
Intermediate Power BI (session 2) 10:00-12:00 Wed 19th February 2025 Power BI ðŸŒ¶ðŸŒ¶: intermediate-level
Excel foundations 1 13:00-14:30 Wed 19th February 2025 Excel ðŸŒ¶ðŸŒ¶: intermediate-level
Intermediate Shiny (session 1) 10:00-12:00 Thu 20th February 2025 Shiny ðŸŒ¶ðŸŒ¶: intermediate-level
````` ## Events - 3.30-4.30pm, Wed 19th February 2025. The KIND community meetup is our regular social learning event. Next week, the presenter will be Deborah Calvin (NHS Lothian), discussing [Getting started with MongoDB/noSQL](https://events.teams.microsoft.com/event/07aebe93-bc29-4698-a1b4-27ccf9eb2905@10efe0bd-a030-4bca-809c-b5e6745e499a), which is a way of efficiently sharing data in R. Click the link to register, and hope to see you there. + we're running our R beginner's club next week 3-4pm, Thursday 13th Feb. That's some social time for beginners to review their code, get unstuck, and pick up some tips and tricks. Please follow [this link to join us](https://teams.microsoft.com/l/meetup-join/19%3ab03b2fd777e440eaa255ba67569762b5%40thread.tacv2/1725260923641?context=%7b%22Tid%22%3a%2210efe0bd-a030-4bca-809c-b5e6745e499a%22%2c%22Oid%22%3a%225d92fd7e-56b9-4892-ab77-84ad75c260a0%22%7d). ## Book of the week character(0). character(0). *character(0)*.
